taskData.title: dstc10_track2_task2
taskData.summary: The DSTC10 Track2 Task 2 follows the DSTC9 Track1 task, where participants have to implement knowledge-grounded dialog systems. The training dataset is inherited from the DSTC9 challenge and is in the written domain, while the test set is newly collected and consists of noisy ASR transcripts. Hence, the dataset facilitates building models for grounded dialog response generation.
